channel.title: Making A Remake
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
I was thinking about making a 2006 remake. Now I know what you all are thinking "LOL another remake" But I want to challenge myself, and support from the Mopar community would be amazing. Now I had a question: Delta is the best way to go correct? If anyone could link me to a good Source + Client for starting this please PM me or leave it in a comment. With that said I would also like you all to leave suggestions for the remake, things you would like to see added that you haven't seen anywhere else. Or just any thoughts that come to mind. Thanks Guys!
PS: I Wasn't Sure Where To Put This, Please Move If It Is In The Wrong Section.

item.title: Making A Remake
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

LOL another remake.

A remake with Delta? It’s the programmer that matters, not his/her source.

Read full topic
